A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I don't mind at all if the director wants to take Star Wars into a different direction\, or do something different. I was hoping they would change things up and break from the formula......

But none of it matters if the story just sucks. It was boring. I've never nodded off during a Star Wars movie before\, not even the Prequels were this boring.

By the 2 hour mark\, I no longer cared about any of the story arcs. I just wanted the movie to end.
